akn:content.akn:p:
§§ 460b, 460c. Repealed. Pub. L. 85–767, § 2 [19, 21, 23, 33], Aug. 27, 1958, 72 Stat. 919
Section 460b, acts June 16, 1936, ch. 582, § 5, 49 Stat. 1520; June 8, 1938, ch. 328, § 8, 52 Stat. 635; Sept. 5, 1940, ch. 715, § 9, 54 Stat. 870, related to determination of location of parkways upon public lands, national forests, or other Federal reservations.
Section 460c, act Sept. 7, 1950, ch. 912, § 4(b), 64 Stat. 787, related to administration of parkway appropriations.
